name: Mica
description: Mica solves the biggest pain points for tenants. It allows them to: - Rent the apartment they desire - Have their bill payments automated - Have financial flexibility, reduced move-in costs, and access to an emergency credit (BNPL) - Improve their credit
one_liner: Mica solves the biggest pain points for tenants. It allows them to: - Rent the apartment they desire - Have their bill payments automated - Have financial flexibility, reduced move-in costs, and access to an emergency credit (BNPL) - Improve their credit
